alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 26 at 3:27AM EDT until May 27 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...North winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...In Georgia, Coastal Bryan, Coastal Chatham, Coastal Liberty and Coastal McIntosh Counties. In South Carolina, Beaufort, Coastal Colleton, Charleston and Coastal Jasper Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 6 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Charleston; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper
